Class ComputerView

java.lang.Object
view.interactableObjectsViews.ComputerView
public class ComputerView extends Object
view of the Computer interactable object

    • ANIMATION_SPEED

      private final int ANIMATION_SPEED
      animation speed of the computer
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • spriteCounter

      private int spriteCounter
      used to time the animation. it is incremented once per frame in the update(), so if framerate is 60fps, then it will be incremented 60 times per second.

    • spriteNum

      private int spriteNum
      number of the sprite currently active

    • computer

      private Computer computer
      Computer instance

    • ComputerView

      public ComputerView(Computer computer)
      view of the Computer model, loads sprite when called via loadSprites()

  • Method Details

    • loadSprites

      private void loadSprites()
      loads the computer sprites

    • update

      public void update()
      updates the sprite counter. increments the spriteCounter once per call.

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2d)
      draw the computer sprite at the Computer x and y coordinates
      Parameters:
      g2d - swing's graphics 2d instance that allows rendering

    • drawMenu

      private void drawMenu(Graphics2D g2d)
      draw the Computer's menu when it is visible
      Parameters:
      g2d - swing's graphics 2d instance that allows rendering

    • loadFont

      private Font loadFont(String fontPath, float size)
      loads the font
      Parameters:
      fontPath - path of the .ttf file
      size - font size
      Returns:
      font if font path is correct, null otherwise
